resources.string: To detect links on-screen and pre-load them, Anticipate requires its accessibility service to be enabled
To open all links using Anticipate, you may set it as the default browser
Another browser is currently set as default. You must clear its defaults first.
On Marshmallow and up, the Draw Over Other Apps permission must be granted to show the floating window
Open settings failed. Please manually clear the defaults for your current browser
Anticipate\'s accessibility service is disabled. Please enable to pre-load links.
Floating window to monitor pre-loaded URLs
